offers.summary: Creates non-alcoholic cocktails for discerning drinkers

points.first: Featured in publications such as the New York Times, Self Magazine, GQ, Imbibe, NYT Wirecutter, and SevenFifty Daily
points.second: Online return customer rate jumped from 17.5% in Q4 2020 to 29.6% in February 2021

points.first: Increased total retail door count from 140 to over 300 from January 2020 to April 2021, including its first Whole Foods locations in Oregon and Washington
Generated more than $1.28 million in revenue in 2020, up 271% year-over-year
points.second: Product can be found in major grocers like Central Market HEB, Safeway, and Wegmans

points.first: Recommended 'New Products'vendor of the AATAC, a national association of retailers and consumer goods buying groups that include operators of 80,000 stores like 7-Eleven, Sunoco, Gulf, and Circle K
points.second: Reached over $64,000 and $19,000 in revenue in Q4 2020 and Q1 2021, respectively, with gross margins above 70%

offers.summary: Air sterilizer designed to destroy airborne pathogens

points.first: Its flagship product, ARECA™, is an in-room air sterilization unit designed to destroy airborne pathogens with PlasmaFence™ technology
points.second: Raised over $250,000 last year through MicroVentures and is returning for another round to further develop its product portfolio

offers.summary: A new, breakthrough salt that delivers full sodium flavor with 50% less sodium

points.first: Delivers 50% sodium reduction while maintaining saltiness in several studies, natural and without any additives
points.second: Experienced team with decades of experience including former P&G and Pringles executives

offers.summary: Provides personal environmental exposure analysis and tracking to consumers

points.first: MOU with Parley for the Oceans (international ocean conservation NGO) and contract with The Community (Publicis Groupe) to launch a plastic awareness campaign in Summer 2021
points.second: Provides mail-in test kits to measure personal exposure of potentially harmful environmental chemicals
